---
title: "CU-PICU Data Management Course"
---

- __Instructor:__ Tell Bennett

- __Questions:__ Open an issue at https://github.com/CU-picudata/course

- __Objectives:__ Following this course, you will be able to:

     - understand the basics of data provenance and reproducibility
     - load a simple dataset (.csv format) into R
     - explore a simple dataset using R
     - have a more informed conversation with an analyst about your own project
     - engage in self-directed ongoing learning about how to manage and analyze data
